mapper.sql: user_zhifubao.id AS userZhifubao_id, user_zhifubao.user_id AS userZhifubao_userId, user_zhifubao.phone AS userZhifubao_phone, user_zhifubao.email AS userZhifubao_email, user_zhifubao.real_name AS userZhifubao_realName, user_zhifubao.identity_code AS userZhifubao_identityCode, user_zhifubao.identity_type AS userZhifubao_identityType, user_zhifubao.reg_time AS userZhifubao_regTime, user_zhifubao.assets_balance AS userZhifubao_assetsBalance, user_zhifubao.assets_yu_e_bao AS userZhifubao_assetsYuEBao, user_zhifubao.assets_fund AS userZhifubao_assetsFund, user_zhifubao.huabei_quota AS userZhifubao_huabeiQuota, user_zhifubao.huabei_balance AS userZhifubao_huabeiBalance, user_zhifubao.consume_quota AS userZhifubao_consumeQuota

id AS id, phone AS phone, email AS email, real_name AS realName, identity_code AS identityCode, identity_type AS identityType, reg_time AS regTime, assets_balance AS assetsBalance, assets_yu_e_bao AS assetsYuEBao, assets_fund AS assetsFund, huabei_quota AS huabeiQuota, huabei_balance AS huabeiBalance, consume_quota AS consumeQuota
mapper.select: select from user_zhifubao,authentication WHERE user_zhifubao.user_id=authentication.user_id AND `user_zhifubao`.`phone` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{phone}),'%') AND authentication.auditor_id=#{adminId} AND datediff(user_zhifubao.gmt_datetime,#{time1}) >=0 AND datediff(user_zhifubao.gmt_datetime,#{time2}) <=0 AND `user_zhifubao`.`status`='使用' ORDER BY user_zhifubao.gmt_datetime DESC LIMIT ${pageNo},${pageSize}

select COUNT(*) from user_zhifubao,authentication WHERE user_zhifubao.user_id=authentication.user_id AND `user_zhifubao`.`status`='使用' AND `user_zhifubao`.`phone` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{phone}),'%') AND authentication.auditor_id=#{adminId} AND datediff(user_zhifubao.gmt_datetime,#{time1}) >=0 AND datediff(user_zhifubao.gmt_datetime,#{time2}) <=0
